page.title: 09PLEASURE BOATS DOWNDERRY
page.content: MOST LOCAL CRAFT HAVE BEEN CLINKER BUILT WOODEN BOATS.NOW MANY OF THE CRAFT ARE FORMED OF GLASS FIBRE,A MUCH LIGHTER CONSTRUCTION.SOME OF THESE BOATS ARE USED FOR PART TIME AND HOBBY FISHING,OR FAMILY VISITS TO SECLUDED COVES.ABOUT SIX SMALL CATAMARANS AND MONOHULLS WITH CENTRE BOARD KEELS ARE USED AS FAST SAILBOATS TO PROVIDE AN EXCITING HOBBY FOR LOCAL MEN. YOUNGER PEOPLE ARE BEGINNING TO INTRODUCE SAILBOARDS. AS THESE ARE READILY TRANSPORTABLE DAY VISITORS OFTEN BRING THEIR BOARDS ON THEIR CARS USUALLY THESE ARE NOT GOOD SURFING BEACHES BUT WITH THE ADVENT OF WET SUITS WHICH PROTECT THE WEARER FROM EXPOSURE,IT IS NOW POSSIBLE TO UTILISE THE WAVES PRODUCED IN THE AUTUMN AND WINTER STORMS.THUS ON SUITABLE DAYS A COLLECTION OF MALIBU BOARDS AND THEIR JOCKEYS APPEAR TO RIDE THE SURF.
